content: Have you experienced any itching or pruritus recently?

content: Have you taken any other over-the-counter medications or herbal supplements recently?
headline: OTC and Supplement Use
clinical_intent: To obtain a comprehensive list of all ingested substances, including over-the-counter medications and herbal supplements, for potential interactions or side effects.
